modShortDescription: This mod modifies all plants so that you can simple hit the E key to pick them up. This makes it super-easy to walk around a field of flowers.
modDescription:
This mod modifies all plants so that you can simple hit the E key to pick them up. This makes it super-easy to walk around a field of flowers and quickly pick all of them without having to swing your weapon or punch them. Mushrooms work now!

## Changelog

Updated for A20.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-Magazine_Plants_Trader/tree/master/Pickup_Plants)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25784-magazine-schematics-skillpoints-e-to-pickup-plants-1day-trader-refresh-a20/).

**Credits:** [ShoudenKalferas](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shoudenkalferas/)
